Pre-Game Insights: Luis Gil will make his first postseason appearance in Game 4 for the New York Yankees.
Gavin Williams will make his playoff debut in Game 4 for the Cleveland Guardians.
Gil finished off the regular season on a rough run, giving up 10 earned runs over 11.0 combined innings between a pair of late-September starts.
Williams posted 10.2 innings with three earned runs over his final two regular-season outings.
The Guardians will have new life heading into Game 4 after avoiding disaster on Thursday with a walk-off home run from David Fry.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The New York Yankees and the Cleveland Guardians meet in Game 4 of a best-of-seven ALCS series.
The game will be played at Progressive Field on Friday, October 18, 2024, at 8:08 pm.

Others: Andrew Jett's pick is the Cleveland Guardians +105.

Andrew Jett's reasoning is that Gil's role in the postseason has been a hot topic of conversation and he may struggle with the long layoff, while Williams has posted strong numbers in his final two regular-season outings.
